logistic regression classifier.from sentence: LR : a logistic regression classifier with n-gram and pos-tag features .

LSTM - Final.from sentence: LSTM - Final ) : a biLSTM model with the final state as a representation .

LSTM - Loc.from sentence: LSTM - Loc ) : a biLSTM model with the state associated with the target position as a representation .

biLSTM model.introduces: complex target - level and sentence - level attention mechanisms

LSTM + TA + SA.from sentence: LSTM + TA + SA ) : a biLSTM model which introduces complex target - level and sentence - level attention mechanisms .

SenticLSTM.from sentence: SenticLSTM : an upgraded version of the LSTM + TA + SA model which introduces external information from Sentic - Net .

Dmu - Entnet.from sentence: Dmu - Entnet : a bidirectional EntNet with external " memory chains " with a delayed memory update mechanism to track entities .
